refnamediv.refpurpose: Checks the status of the previously executed connection request.

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
int mysql_real_connect_cont
MYSQL ** ret
MYSQL * mysql
int status
Initiates a non-blocking connection request to a server.

&reftitle.parameters;
ret
When &function.mysql_real_connect_cont; returns zero, a copy of the passed 'mysql' argument is stored in *ret.
mysql
A mysql handle, which was previously initialized or allocated by &function.mysql_init; and connected by &function.mysql_real_connect_start;.
status
Return value from a previously executed &function.mysql_real_connect_start; or &function.mysql_real_connect_cont; function

&reftitle.notes;
The value of *ret is a connection handle. In case it's value is NULL, a connection error occured.
